casebody.data:
Paul FRAMPTON
v.
UNIVERSITY OF NORTH CAROLINA AT CHAPEL HILL. No. 248P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Barry Nakell, for Frampton, Paul. Kimberly D. Potter, Assistant Attorney General, for University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General, for University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 29th of July 2015 by Petitioner-Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
